home.title: Excellence in Coffee Processing Machinery
home.subtitle: Industrias Jaber provides premium solutions for every stage of your production, from harvesting the cherry to the perfect final grind.

processes.title: Our Processes
processes.subtitle: Complete coffee processing solutions
processes.harvestingDesc: Our advanced sorting and cleaning technology ensures only the finest cherries move forward in your production line.
processes.roastingDesc: Precision temperature control and airflow management for achieving the perfect bean profile every single time.
processes.grindingDesc: Uniform particle size distribution for optimal extraction. Engineered for high-volume industrial environments.

cta.title: Ready to elevate your coffee production?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of growers and roasters who have scaled their business with Jaber machinery. Contact our experts today for a customized machinery consultation.

hero.title: Machinery for Every Stage
hero.description: Explore our range of high-performance industrial equipment designed specifically for the unique demands of coffee production.

cta.title: Need a custom machinery solution?
cta.subtitle: Our engineering team specializes in custom production line design. Let's discuss how we can optimize your facility's efficiency.

machinery.title: Machinery
machinery.subtitle: Professional equipment for the coffee industry

hero.title: Decades of Engineering Perfection
hero.description: From a small workshop to a global leader in coffee processing, our journey is defined by a passion for the perfect bean.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in the heart of the coffee belt, Industrias Jaber began with a single vision: to build machinery that respects the artisanal nature of coffee while providing the efficiency of modern engineering. Our founder, an engineer and third-generation coffee grower, saw the need for precision tools that could withstand the rigors of industrial production without sacrificing the subtle profiles of specialty beans.
story.paragraph2: Today, we combine traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge digital controls, ensuring that every piece of machinery leaving our floor is a testament to our heritage and a tool for your future growth.
story.quote: Engineering the soul of coffee since 1984.

corePrinciples.title: Mission & Values
corePrinciples.sustainabilityDesc: We design machinery that minimizes energy consumption and water waste, ensuring the coffee industry thrives for generations.
corePrinciples.innovationDesc: Constant R&D allows us to integrate smart sensors and AI-driven roasting profiles into every machine we build.
corePrinciples.qualityDesc: Using only premium materials like food-grade stainless steel and heavy-duty motors, our machines are built for life.

leadership.title: Meet the Experts
leadership.description: Our team brings together mechanical engineers, roast masters, and agronomists to provide a 360° perspective on coffee technology.

alejandro.name: Alejandro Jaber
alejandro.description: A visionary engineer with 40 years of experience in thermal dynamics and coffee science.

elena.name: Elena Martinez
elena.description: Leading the transition into IoT-enabled machinery and sustainable roasting technologies.

julian.name: Julian Rojas
julian.description: Ensuring that every client across 5 continents receives world-class support and installation.

sofia.name: Sofia Gomez
sofia.description: Bridging the gap between engineering and the perfect cup, testing every prototype personally.
